languages.text: All allies gain +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against a {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} enemy, +15% if the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is more than or equal to V.
languages.original_text: Все союзники получают +7% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g} против преследуемого. Если его {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг{/g} выше или равен V, союзники получают +15% к шансу попадания.

languages.text: Alle Verbündeten erhalten +7 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} gegen einen {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}verfolgten{/g} Gegner; +15 %, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsgrad{/g} des Gegners größer oder gleich V ist.
languages.original_text: All allies gain +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against a {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} enemy, +15% if the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is more than or equal to V.

traits.locale_text: Alle Verbündeten erhalten +20% {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} gegen einen {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}verfolgten{/g} Gegner; +30%, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsgrad{/g} des Gegners größer oder gleich V ist.

languages.text: Tous les alliés bénéficient de +7 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} un ennemi subissant l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}Traque{/g}, de +15 % si le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi est supérieur ou égal à V.
languages.original_text: All allies gain +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against a {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} enemy, +15% if the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is more than or equal to V.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés bénéficient de +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} contre un ennemi sous l'effet de {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}Traque{/g}, de +30 % si le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi est supérieur ou égal à V.

languages.text: 所有盟友在攻击拥有被{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追踪{/g}的敌人时，都可以获得+7%{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}，如果敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}不低于V，此加成提高至15%。
languages.original_text: All allies gain +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against a {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} enemy, +15% if the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is more than or equal to V.

traits.locale_text: 所有盟友在攻击拥有被{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追踪{/g}的敌人时，都可以获得+20%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}，如果敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}不低于V，此加成提高至30%。

languages.original_text: All allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} against a trailed enemy, +30% if the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is more than or equal to V.

languages.text: Todos los aliados obtienen un +7 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} contra un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}rastreado{/g}, +15 % si el {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo es igual o superior a V.

Все союзники получают +20% к шансу попадания против преследуемого. Если его ранг выше или равен V, союзники получают +30% к шансу попадания.

languages.text: すべての味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追跡中{/g}の敵に対し{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}が7％増加する。敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}がV以上の場合は15％増加する。

traits.locale_text: すべての味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追跡中{/g}の敵に対し{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}が20％増加する。敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}がV以上の場合は30％増加する。

languages.text: Tüm dost birimler, {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}izlenen{/g} bir düşmana karşı +%7 {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}zorluk derecesi{/g}, V'e eşit veya ondan yüksekse bu oran +%15'a çıkar.
